topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/556fef336368725403d82300#post_556fef336368725403d82300
Imagine the Cenobites trying to take on Jason. A being that feels neither pain nor pleasure. No remorse or regret. Just a walking tank bent on murder and destruction. A _creature_ more akin to a force of fucking nature. How would they deal with something like that?

topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/556ff0a363687254ff870800#post_556ff0a363687254ff870800
Naaaah. See Michael Meyers, while evil in his own right, is still fallable. He still feels physical sensations. He can be hurt and even killed. Jason is unfeeling. Both emotionally amd physically. Imagine Freddy Krueger taking on fucking Carrie!
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/556feecb6368725a5f3d4f00#post_556feecb6368725a5f3d4f00
What might happen if the cost of digital distribution gets cheap enough is companies selling their games directly from their company. . . I honestly have no idea how that would turn out cause it would be down to the individual companies how to proceed.

Imagine a small independent studio able to sell their games directly to the customers with no middle man?

topics.body: And while we're on the topic, the most recent Evil Dead movie wasn't that bad actually. I mean it wasn't as perfect in every way as Evil Dead 2 but I think it at least surpassed the original. Hell it even had _that scene_ in it.

topics.body: Going to sleep. Today has been a pretty bizarre day.
topics.author: 4fde5cee945b700a970060fc

topics.body:
"@hype":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/556ff2966368725403292d00#post_556ff2966368725403292d00
Personally I think such a situation would be a drastic positive shift in gaming.  Right now you have to worry about cost of physical distribution, the cost of publishing, the cost of advertisement; a million different costs before they can even make the game and unrelated to actually making a game.  If companies can just sell their games directly then they can just make it and do it.
